attributes.action: we the undersigned petition the pm to pass a law that  stops any employers from making any British worker being served with redundancy and employing any immigrant worker for less wages
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: no employer should be allowed to serve redundancy on British workers and still employ immigrants.all immigrant workers should be the first, regardless of time served , job qualifications etc.British jobs for British workers

rejection.details: This petition is similar to another, please see: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/uk-jobs/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
